nodes.bodyText: Do we enforce policy name presence and/or uniqueness today? If not, what happens if someone adds multiple policies without setting names? Should this be a multi-dimensional comparison if this is an issue?

Both are enforced in the constructor of AuthorizedPeer.
I just discovered that I have to rewrite compareTo to be consistent with equals. TreeSet.equals is currently reporting false positives 😨

There is no simple way to implement Comparable to be "consistent with equals" (ref Javadoc for Comparable). I have removed the commit - it was really not necessary (only intended to improve assertion error messages in a related unit test).
